service.title: Encrypted Content-Encoding for HTTP
service.documentation: This memo introduces a content coding for HTTP that allows message payloads to be encrypted.

http-content-coding.documentation: The "aes128gcm" HTTP content coding indicates that a payload has been encrypted using Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) in Galois/Counter Mode (GCM) as identified as AEAD_AES_128_GCM in RFC 5116. The AEAD_AES_128_GCM algorithm uses a 128 bit content encryption key.
